entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with snow overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
